name: get_beers_by_single_country
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool beers_list.
Tool description: A list of beers from many European countries
API description: Available Countries are:
- denmark
- sweden
- belgium
- spain
- portugal
- ireland
- luxembourg
- norway
- finland
- switzerland
- czech
- italy
- poland
- malta

beerid.description: The identifier of the beer to fetch details for.
